snippet.title: Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 Spaceworld 2001 Presentation Partial Restoration
snippet.description:
I was snagging up some cool GameCube beta games footage off of IGN's video archives, and I noticed that Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 featured some clips very close to one another.  Enough digging and an external clip later, and I almost pieced together the entire presentation for the game at Spaceworld 2001!

Source Videos:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5rLhIwp2iGk
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=66_xvhHdCv4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1HD00DuVxKc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dcnaC_9qpLs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dePt5wTOPr4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y2cP-83WRRQ

There is also this clip, which likely fit into the first cut somewhere, but it seems strange given that two clips featuring the level starting exist.  In hindsight, I probably should have included it instead since it features more of the stage.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jXRxaz7SzpI

I'm not really in a position do do anything about the lost quality.  If you know about more clips that I didn't find, I'd love to add them!

Edit 4/14/2020
I found a recording of the full presentation.  Check it out!
https://youtu.be/BN6QTvSmYCk?t=8m40s
And a new clip here as well.
https://youtu.be/tlyU5MmtAHI
